excerpt: La Fortuna is a small town in Costa Rica, northwest of the capital, San José. It’s known as a gateway to Arenal Volcano National Park, comprising 2 volcanoes. Active Arenal Volcano is still laced with lava flows. Hot springs dot the foot of the volcano, on the thermal Tabacón River. Dormant Chato Volcano has a crater lake and rainforest trails leading to La Fortuna Waterfall, with its natural pool.
detail_description: La Fortuna, also known as La Fortuna de San Carlos, is a charming town in Costa Rica that serves as the gateway to Arenal Volcano National Park. The park features two volcanoes - the active Arenal Volcano with lava flows and hot springs at its base, and the dormant Chato Volcano with a crater lake and rainforest trails leading to La Fortuna Waterfall.
name: La Fortuna
address: Alajuela Province, Costa Rica

detail_description: El Salto, a popular spot among locals, offers a thrilling experience with its rope swing over the refreshing La Fortuna river. Visitors can enjoy swimming and bathing in the beautiful river, or take the daredevil plunge from the swing into the water. The area also features small waterfalls and swimming holes for those seeking a more relaxed experience. While parking options are available nearby, many choose to park at a roadside soda for convenience.
name: El Salto (Rope Swing)
address: F954+4RQ, Río, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of La Fortuna de San Carlos, Don Rufino is a culinary gem that beautifully marries contemporary cuisine with local flavors. This restaurant stands out for its commitment to fine dining, making it an ideal spot for special occasions or simply indulging in exquisite dishes paired with exceptional wines. The ambiance is warm and inviting, perfect for those looking to enjoy a memorable meal while soaking in the vibrant atmosphere of Costa Rica.
name: Don Rufino
address: 142 94, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

detail_description: Parque de La Fortuna is a vibrant and bustling town in Costa Rica, offering a peaceful and quaint atmosphere. The park at the center of town provides a lovely place to relax, with benches, shade, and picturesque views of the Arenal Volcano.
name: Parque de La Fortuna
address: F9C3+MWH, C. 470, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: The Coffee & Chocolate Tour La Fortuna offers an educational and enjoyable experience for the whole family. Visitors can learn about the production processes of coffee and chocolate, interact with passionate locals, and gain insight into Costa Rica's main exports. The tour provides a glimpse into traditional methods of growing, harvesting, and processing coffee beans. With a focus on both education and hands-on experiences, participants have the opportunity to make their own coffee and chocolate while also sampling sugar cane shots.
name: Coffee & Chocolate Tour La Fortuna
address: 800 east of the Central Park, La Fortuna, Province Alajuela, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: Embark on a horseback riding adventure in Costa Rica's La Fortuna countryside to explore its hidden gems. Traverse rivers, lush forests, and reach breathtaking viewpoints inaccessible by car or foot. Experience a unique journey to a stunning waterfall, combining horseback riding with hiking through picturesque landscapes. Enjoy the company of well-trained horses and knowledgeable guides who ensure a comfortable and informative experience. Indulge in sweet, juicy pineapples after the hike and relish the outstanding views along the way.
name: Horseback Riding Costa Rica
address: 21007, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 27001, Costa Rica

detail_description: Embark on an exhilarating canyoning adventure in La Fortuna with ABC Canyoning, where you'll descend 200-foot waterfalls and towering cliffs deep within the rainforest. Despite initial apprehension, the lush surroundings will ease any fears as you rappel down multiple stunning waterfalls. Knowledgeable guides like Alex and Javier ensure a safe and enjoyable experience for all ages, even spotting wildlife during the hike back up.
name: ABC Canyoning - Waterfall Rappeling in La Fortuna
address: avenue, Av. 333 460, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: Bogarin Trail, located in La Fortuna, Costa Rica, offers a 1.5-mile trek through lush landscapes teeming with diverse wildlife. Visitors can opt for a guided tour to enhance their experience and spot sloths, exotic birds, insects, and poison dart frogs. Those who attempted to find wildlife on their own near the roads found it fruitless and recommend heading straight to Bogarin Trail instead.
name: Bogarin Trail
address: C. 480, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

excerpt: Unique, rustic spot with volcano views offering an interactive, educational workshop on chocolate.
detail_description: Immerse yourself in the world of chocolate with the Rainforest Chocolate Tour, a unique and educational experience set against the backdrop of stunning volcano views. This tour offers an interactive workshop where you can learn about the process of making chocolate, exploring its history, culture, and traditions in Costa Rica. Led by knowledgeable guides like El Chapo and Elio, visitors get to participate in tastings and hands-on activities such as creating their own chocolate concoctions.
name: Rainforest Chocolate Tour
address: La Fortuna - Catarata Río Fortuna, Provincia de Alajuela, San Carlos, Costa Rica

excerpt: 70-m. waterfall on the Fortuna River, plunging into a natural pool amid lush tropical forest.
detail_description: Located in the La Fortuna area, Fortuna Waterfall is a 70-meter natural wonder on the Fortuna River. The surrounding tropical forest and crystal-clear waters create an enchanting atmosphere, perfect for swimming and picnicking. Visitors can expect a challenging hike with 500 steps but are rewarded with motivational quotes along the way. The waterfall's rocky surroundings and swimming hole offer opportunities to observe fish, while an orchid path provides a scenic walk.
name: Fortuna Waterfall
address: Alajuela Province, San Carlos, Costa Rica

name: Maquique Adventure Canyoning and Rafting
address: Unnamed Road, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

detail_description: Organico Fortuna is a family-owned restaurant in La Fortuna that focuses on serving organic dishes made from locally-sourced ingredients. The menu offers a diverse range of fully-vegetarian options, including many vegan and gluten-free choices. The picturesque eco-conscious eatery also features a small market where visitors can purchase locally made products.
name: Organico Fortuna
address: East From Parque, 100 Meters, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

detail_description: Arenal Mundo Aventura Park offers a variety of activities including zip lining, horseback riding, rappelling, and visits to the Maleku village. Visitors can enjoy the thrill of zip lining with experienced guides ensuring safety and fun. The full-day trip includes surprises like horseback riding and swimming in a waterfall. The hike to the waterfall is described as beautiful and easy, while the Maleku village tour provides insight into Costa Rica's history.
name: Parque Arenal Mundo Aventura
address: La Fortuna - Catarata Río Fortuna, Alajuela Province, San Ramón, Costa Rica

detail_description: Arenal Rafting Company is a popular tour operator in Arenal, offering tours on Rio Balsa at a slightly cheaper price. Visitors have had an amazing time with skilled and fun guides who prioritize safety while ensuring an incredibly enjoyable experience. The Balsa River and its surroundings offer breathtaking natural beauty, making it an unforgettable white water rafting destination. Additionally, the company provides all necessary equipment, delicious meals, and even photography services to capture the memorable moments of the tour.
name: Arenal Rafting
address: Av 333 y Calle 460, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: El Salto, located on the River Fortuna just outside of Arenal, is a popular spot for outdoor activities. Visitors can enjoy a rope swing and a small waterfall here. While the area is known for its beauty and fun experiences like swinging into the deep pool, some have noted that aggressive parking attendants and vendors can detract from the overall experience. However, it's still considered an awesome place to cool off and enjoy freshwater activities.
name: El Salto - Río Fortuna
address: F954+4RQ, Río, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

detail_description: Arenal Canopy Tours is a popular choice for those seeking a milder ziplining experience in La Fortuna de San Carlos, Costa Rica. It's perfect for first-timers and families, offering a thrilling adventure without being too high or fast. The tour includes a Tarzan swing for an extra adrenaline rush. The area is rich in natural attractions such as the Arenal Volcano and La Fortuna Waterfall, making it ideal for nature tourism.
name: Arenal Canopy
address: 150 meters south 25 meters west from The Fire Station, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: Anch'io is a highly recommended Italian restaurant located in the heart of La Fortuna, offering excellent pizza and pasta. The building has fun details on its walls and floor, creating a cute and friendly atmosphere. Visitors can enjoy fine dining while taking in views of the nearby Volcano. The restaurant offers tasty dishes with good portions, including delicious pizza with flavorful ingredients. While the prices are a bit high, the service is generally helpful and fast.
name: Anch'io
address: F9C2+69H, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

detail_description: Mercadito Arenal is a vibrant spot offering a variety of dining options, making it perfect for groups with diverse tastes. From burgers to sushi, pizza to cocktails, there's something for everyone. The atmosphere is lively and enjoyable, catering to all ages. The service is excellent with English-speaking staff providing great recommendations. Whether you're craving tacos, sushi rolls, or specialty drinks like margaritas and cocojitos, this venue has it all.
name: Mercadito Arenal
address: F89X+MXW, 142, 700 mts del Parque, C. 480, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: La Fortuna Downtown Cabin is an excellent place to stay, offering a clean and convenient location near all the attractions. The dry season from December to April is the best time to visit, with sunny days and temperatures perfect for outdoor activities. However, it's also the peak tourist season, so be prepared for larger crowds.
name: La Fortuna Downtown Cabin
address: Calle 468 300 meters north from Banco Nacional Alajuela La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: India Curry House is a must-visit for anyone who loves Indian food. The restaurant offers excellent customer service and hospitality, with servers like Rebecca providing prompt attention and honest recommendations. The chef's personal touch in asking about preferences adds to the experience. The authentic naan oven produces amazing bread varieties like Garlic Naan and Chilli Garlic Naan.
name: India Curry House
address: 142, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

detail_description: Area 360 Canyoning Arenal offers an exhilarating adventure that goes beyond just rappelling down waterfalls. The stunning location and professional yet friendly guides ensure a safe and enjoyable experience. The tour begins with a scenic hike to the breathtaking waterfalls, where knowledgeable guides provide insights into the surrounding flora. Even those with fears or physical limitations are well taken care of by the supportive guides.
name: Area 360 canyoning arenal, Rappelling Waterfall Near Arenal
address: 702, Alajuela Province, Fortuna, Costa Rica

detail_description: When you find yourself in La Fortuna, a visit to Harmony Relaxing Spa is an absolute must for a rejuvenating experience. Nestled amidst the lush tropical rainforest and close to the renowned hot springs powered by Arenal Volcano's geothermal energy, this spa offers a serene escape from everyday life. Families can indulge in therapeutic treatments like body wraps and exfoliation, while everyone enjoys soothing massages tailored to their needs—even kids are welcomed with mini massages!
name: Harmony Relaxing Spa
address: 21007, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: La Fortuna Butterfly Garden, located in the rural town of El Castillo, is a must-visit for nature and wildlife enthusiasts. The garden is home to a diverse array of butterflies, frogs, and other animals. Visitors can explore the well-maintained rainforest trails with the guidance of knowledgeable staff who provide insights into the butterflies' life cycle. Guests have raved about their experiences, praising the beautiful and unique variety of butterflies as well as the informative and friendly guides.
name: La Fortuna Butterfly Garden
address: Av. 325, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

name: Costa Rica Paradise Travel
address: en, Iglesia Católica, 3.5 kilómetros al oeste de la, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

name: Night Walk La Fortuna Near Arenal Volcano
address: Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, 21007, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

excerpt: Posh getaway with a spa & 25 geothermal pools, plus volcano views, a restaurant & free breakfast.
detail_description: Baldi Hot Springs Resort Hotel & Spa is a luxurious retreat nestled in the heart of Costa Rica, offering an unforgettable experience with its 25 geothermal pools and stunning views of nearby volcanoes. Guests can indulge in relaxation at the spa or enjoy complimentary breakfast at the on-site restaurant. While some visitors have noted that the food quality could be improved, many rave about the beautiful surroundings and variety of pool options available.
name: Baldi Hot Springs Resort Hotel & Spa
address: 142, Alajuela Province, San Carlos, Costa Rica

detail_description: Proyecto Asis is a truly inspiring animal rehabilitation sanctuary dedicated to the care of wildlife rescued from poaching and illegal pet ownership. During my visit, I had the pleasure of joining a wildlife tour and volunteering experience that was nothing short of magical. Our guide, Carlos, radiated passion for his work; he not only educated us about the pressing issues facing local birds and monkeys but also showcased an undeniable bond with the animals in his care.
name: Proyecto Asis
address: 141, Provincia de Alajuela, San Carlos, Costa Rica

detail_description: The Free Natural Hot Springs River is a hidden gem located near a resort. Visitors can park on the road and pay a small fee to access the area. The hot springs are best enjoyed in the morning to avoid crowds, offering a relaxing experience surrounded by beach trees. It's recommended to bring water shoes due to the rocky river bed, and some pools are accessed through a dark tunnel and climbing onto the dry river bank.
name: Free Natural Hot Springs River
address: In front of Tabacon Hot Springs, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

excerpt: Straightforward rooms in a serene hot spring resort offering massages, a swim-up bar & dining.
detail_description: Paradise Hot Springs is a tranquil retreat that offers an unforgettable experience for those seeking relaxation and rejuvenation. Nestled in a stunning natural setting, this resort features comfortable and clean accommodations, making it the perfect base after a day of adventure like hiking or zip-lining through the lush jungle. Guests rave about the delightful dining options available on-site, complemented by friendly service from staff members who go above and beyond to ensure your stay is enjoyable.
name: Paradise Hot Springs
address: 5km noroeste del Parque de La Fortuna Ruta Nacional Secundaria 142 Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

excerpt: Lush forest with trails amid a crocodile lagoon, frog garden & turtle pond, plus colorful orchids.
detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Costa Rica, Natura Eco Park is a vibrant haven for nature enthusiasts. This lush sanctuary features winding trails that meander through a crocodile lagoon, a charming frog garden, and a serene turtle pond adorned with colorful orchids. Visitors rave about their experiences here, often guided by knowledgeable staff like Elias and Meyling, who bring the park's wonders to life with engaging stories and insights.
name: Natura Eco Park - Costa Rica
address: G826+5X3, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, La Palma, 21007, Costa Rica

excerpt: The huge Arenal eruption of 1968 gave this hike offering views of the lava fields its name.
detail_description: Arenal Volcano View and Lava Trails is a captivating hiking destination that showcases the stunning aftermath of the 1968 eruption. Hikers can choose between two distinct paths: The Colada 1968 Trail, which meanders through impressive lava fields, and The Bosque 1968 Trail, offering a lush forest experience. For those eager to explore both trails in one day, they total just under 4.5 miles (7 km).
name: Arenal 1968 Volcano View and Lava Trails
address: Calle Real el Castillo, Alajuela Province, San Carlos, 21007, Costa Rica

excerpt: Water park featuring slides, a children's play area & pools with swim-up bars, plus a restaurant.
detail_description: Kalambu Hot Springs is a delightful water park that offers an array of fun and relaxation for visitors of all ages. Nestled amidst lush greenery and boasting stunning views of the surrounding volcano, this park features various thermal pools with different shapes and temperatures, making it a perfect spot to unwind. The atmosphere is serene, especially during quieter times like Tuesday afternoons in December when you can enjoy the five thrilling slides without long waits.
name: Kalambu Hot Springs
address: Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: Mirador el Silencio offers an unforgettable hiking experience, even during the rainy season when downpours are common. The lush rainforest canopy provides a shield from the rain, allowing you to stay relatively dry as you navigate the trails. While some sections may get slippery after passing the lava falls, overall, it's manageable and enjoyable. Be sure to pack insect repellent for your adventure! The trail can be a bit tricky with its confusing map layout; many hikers have found themselves on unexpected loops.
name: Mirador el Silencio
address: F7MC+W37, 142, Provincia de Alajuela, San Carlos, Costa Rica

detail_description: Parroquia San Juan Bosco is a charming Catholic church that embodies authentic Spanish architectural style, nestled in the heart of La Fortuna. While it lacks air conditioning, which can make for a warm experience during services on sunny days, the local community generously offers cold beverages after Sunday mass to help attendees cool down. The church boasts ample free parking options—just be mindful of the orange-vested overseers who may request tips if you encounter them.
name: Parroquia San Juan Bosco
address: F9C3+JJM, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

detail_description: Arenal Vida Campesina is a stunning farm that offers an array of engaging tours, perfect for those looking to immerse themselves in the local culture and agriculture. Visitors can embark on a captivating coffee tour where they stroll through lush landscapes, learning about various plants and their unique stories. The experience includes participating in the coffee roasting process and savoring freshly brewed coffee paired with delightful local treats.
name: Arenal Vida Campesina
address: 21007, Alajuela Province, San Carlos, 21007, Costa Rica

name: Tabacon Hot Springs
address: 21007, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: Eco-Lodge Hotel by Wellness Park Costa Rica & Trekking trails is a nature lover's paradise with helpful and knowledgeable staff. The property offers private hiking trails, including a stunning hanging bridge with breathtaking views. The accommodation options are well-maintained, allowing guests to unplug and immerse themselves in nature. Visitors can also enjoy delicious dishes prepared by the talented chef Mario at the on-site restaurant. The hotel aims to provide a peaceful and eco-friendly experience while leaving ample space for wildlife.
name: Wellness Park Nature Reserve & Ecolodge
address: 2.5Km Este de La Represa del Arenal, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

name: Paraiso Orgánico
address: Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

detail_description: Mariposario Butterfly Kingdom Costa Rica has been welcoming visitors since 2011, offering a serene and enchanting experience surrounded by fluttering butterflies. The highlight of the kingdom is the stunning bright blue morpho butterfly, native to Central America. Inside the butterfly enclosure, guests can observe butterfly eggs, chrysalises, caterpillars, and an abundance of flying butterflies. Visitors can also enjoy feeding the butterflies with sponges provided at no extra cost.
name: Mariposario Butterfly Kingdom Costa Rica
address: Del puente de Los Anonos, metros OESTE 100 metros OESTE, 1 km SUR y 100, San José, Escazú, Vista Alegre, 10203, Costa Rica

excerpt: Remote rainforest lodge offering a restaurant/bar, a spa & an outdoor pool, plus volcano views.
detail_description: Arenal Observatory Lodge & Trails is a secluded rainforest retreat with stunning volcano views. The lodge offers a restaurant, bar, spa, and outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy the abundance of wildlife and birds in the area along with great hiking trails. The rooms provide amazing views but are basic in amenities. The friendly staff and cleanliness of the resort are highly praised by visitors. It's recommended to have an SUV for access and to be prepared for limited dining options nearby.
name: Arenal Observatory Lodge
address: 7Km Sureste del Parque Nacional Volcan Arenal, Alajuela Province, San Carlos, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: Discover the Arenal Volcano Rainforest Reserve, a wildlife refuge where you can explore the lush rainforest and encounter diverse species of animals. With knowledgeable guides like Jose Arenal Volcano Guide, visitors can enjoy afternoon and night walks to spot fascinating creatures such as anteaters and tropical birds. The reserve is well-preserved, making it a great destination for couples and families seeking an immersive experience in nature.
name: Arenal Volcano Rain forest Reserve Hostel ; Apartments and private villa
address: 21007, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

detail_description: Nestled in the heart of La Fortuna, Galeria Estudio La Fortuna is a treasure trove for art lovers and souvenir seekers alike. This charming shop showcases an impressive array of handcrafted goods created by talented local artisans, ensuring that each piece is unique and tells its own story. Unlike typical tourist shops filled with mass-produced items, Galeria Estudio offers a refreshing selection of beautiful pottery, stunning paintings, and one-of-a-kind artworks at reasonable prices.
name: Galeria Estudio La Fortuna
address: 21007, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

name: El Canto Waterfalls
address: C9R8+856, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

name: Green Eco Park
address: FCG8+FP7, Provincia de Alajuela, San Carlos, Costa Rica

excerpt: A trail with stairs & rest areas takes visitors to this 270-ft. waterfall where swimming is allowed.
name: Ecological Reserve Fortuna Waterfall
address: C8VM+236, Calle 470, Alajuela Province, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

excerpt: Forested 29,700-acre national park with trails through the lava fields of an active volcano.
detail_description: Parque Nacional Volcán Arenal is a vast 29,700-acre national park featuring trails that wind through the lava fields of an active volcano. From 1968 to 2010, the volcano was known for its frequent eruptions and glowing molten rock. Although it's currently dormant, the park remains a popular destination within Area de Conservacion Arenal.
name: Parque Nacional Volcán Arenal
address: F76C+FPQ, Alajuela Province, El Castillo, La Fortuna, Costa Rica

name: Wood & Art Gallery
address: Casa Lunas, 600mts west from hotel, Provincia de Alajuela, La Fortuna, 21007, Costa Rica

name: Finca Rancho Verde
address: H84C+6V9, Pastaste, Alajuela Province, Monterrey, Costa Rica
